title: H.A.M. robes

properties.name: description
properties.value: H.A.M. robes are the uniform worn by the Humans Against Monsters cult. They can be obtained by pickpocketing male and female H.A.M. members using the Thieving skill or by killing H.A.M. Guards. While wearing parts of this outfit, players are slightly less likely to be kicked out of the H.A.M. Hideout when failing to pickpocket H.A.M. members, with the effect increasing with the number of pieces worn.[1]

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:H.A.M. robes

H.A.M. robes are the uniform worn by the Humans Against Monsters cult. They can be obtained by pickpocketing male and female H.A.M. members using the Thieving skill or by killing H.A.M. Guards. While wearing parts of this outfit, players are slightly less likely to be kicked out of the H.A.M. Hideout when failing to pickpocket H.A.M. members, with the effect increasing with the number of pieces worn.[1]

A robe top, robe bottom, and hood are acquired during The Lost Tribe. Two full sets are needed for Death to the Dorgeshuun. During Death to the Dorgeshuun, the chance to receive robe pieces is considerably higher.[2]

Players can store a complete set of H.A.M. robes in the armour case of the costume room of their player-owned house.

After Death to the Dorgeshuun is completed, only the Ham robe and Ham boots serve a purpose, both used for easy clues.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The H.A.M. members located in the H.A.M. hideout wear neither Ham boots nor Ham gloves.
    • They appear to be bare-handed and wear brown boots.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 8 July 2016. (Archived from the original on 20 December 2019.) Mod Ash: "HAM kit doesn't reduce getting caught, but each piece makes you slightly less likely to be ejected after being caught."
  2. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 30 March 2018. (Archived from the original on 28 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "Are you on the bit of the quest where you need it? If so, the chance of you getting HAM kit is considerably higher."
